core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix organic nature vibes with precision tech efficiency.
Emotion First: Trust, Freshness, and Relief (from chores).
Content is King: Every section must sell the 'worry-free lawn' promise.
Zoom In: Use high-res textures of grass and tools to create tactile feelings.
Negative Space: Generous padding to reflect the openness of a well-kept garden.
anti_patterns: No generic 'SaaS Blue' - use Brand Green.
No full-screen gradients - use texture and white space.

usage_rules: Headings (H1-H3) must use 'tracking-tight' for a modern, compact look.
Overlines/Labels must be uppercase, small text-xs, and 'tracking-widest'.
Body text should have 'leading-relaxed' for readability.
Do not use bold for everything; use font weight contrast (e.g., Bold Heading + Light Body).

rules: Use Primary Green (#3FA34D) for main CTAs and key highlights.
Use Dark Green (#2d7a38) for text links and hover states.
Backgrounds should be mostly White (#FFFFFF) or very light Gray (#F9FAFB).
Avoid pure black; use #222222 for high contrast text.
Use 'accent' (light green bg) for active states in booking forms or selected cards.

spacing_system.philosophy: Generous spacing. Use p-8, p-12, p-16 for section padding.

grid_system.marketing: Use 'Bento' grid (asymmetric) for services and features.
grid_system.dashboard: Use dense grid for the booking summary.
rules: Desktop: grid-cols-3 or grid-cols-12 for complex layouts.
Gap: Use gap-6 or gap-8 to let content breathe.

variants.primary: bg-[#3FA34D] text-white hover:bg-[#2d7a38] shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300

cards.style: bg-white rounded-xl border border-gray-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300
cards.features: Use 'group' hover effects to animate icons or text color.

inputs.style: h-12 rounded-md border-gray-200 focus:border-[#3FA34D] focus:ring-[#3FA34D] bg-white

booking_wizard.step_indicator: Flex row with numbered circles. Active step: Green bg, White text. Inactive: Gray bg.
booking_wizard.navigation: Fixed bottom bar on mobile, inline buttons on desktop.

visual_enhancers.shadows: Use soft, diffuse shadows (shadow-lg, shadow-xl) for floating elements like the booking card.
visual_enhancers.borders: Subtle 1px borders (border-gray-100) to define structure without heaviness.
visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-xl or rounded-2xl for containers to feel friendly and organic.
visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise or grain overlay on solid green backgrounds to add depth.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 for sticky headers or floating booking summaries.

media.image_style: Natural, bright, high-contrast. Avoid overly staged stock photos. Focus on green lawns, happy people, and professional equipment.
media.icons: Use 'lucide-react'. Stroke width: 1.5px or 2px. Color: Primary Green or Dark Gray.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text contrast ratio is at least 4.5:1. Use Dark Gray (#222222) on White.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-offset-2 ring-[#3FA34D]) for keyboard navigation.
accessibility.aria_labels: All icon-only buttons must have aria-label.
accessibility.testing: All interactive elements must have 'data-testid' attribute.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Configure Tailwind theme with the specified colors and fonts.
3. Create the 'BookingWizard' component as a priority feature.
4. Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections.
5. Ensure the site is fully responsive (mobile-first).
6. Implement the 'Bento' grid for the Services section.
7. Use 'framer-motion' for subtle entrance animations (fade-up) if available, otherwise standard CSS transitions.
8. Do NOT use generic placeholder text; use the provided slogan and context.
universal_guidelines: Create depth with z-index and shadows.
No 'transparent' backgrounds on overlays without blur.
